channel.title: Roberto-Fernandez-Retamar on Noah Mazer
channel.description: Recent content in Roberto-Fernandez-Retamar on Noah Mazer

item.title: Roberto Fernández Retamar - Madrigal
item.description: [Madrigal] There was the small bourgeoisie, The comprador bourgeoisie, The plantation owners, The proletariat, The peasantry, Other classes, And you, All trembles, all thrill.
